title: Saying NO to Lesser Important Things
itunes:summary:
John, Greg and Erin discuss how saying "No" to lesser important things can benefit your marriage, and leave room for more important things. Featuring Pastor Levi Lusko, Jennie Lusko and Mrs. Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Crazy Little Thing Called Marriage" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-06?refcd=1111507

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/saying-no-to-lesser-important-things/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
